title: Advanced specialized language proficiency course using gamification: Integrated training in communication, vocabulary, and expression

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency (reading·writing·speaking·listening) and understanding of domain-specific vocabulary, digital device usage experience
context.additional_context: Providing customized professional language learning experiences that combine VR simulations and gamification elements in a BYOD environment. Focuses on enhancing learners' vocabulary expansion, expression accuracy, and sentence structure diversity. Applies a comprehensive language proficiency assessment system utilizing text and speech data.

learning_goals: Improve communication skills (speaking, listening, expression) in specialized fields (medical/business, etc.) by over 80% through role-playing based on virtual scenarios.
Increase language learning engagement and motivation by 30% using a gamification reward system (badges, leaderboards, etc.).

Learners form a team of 3 peers, perform a 15-minute role-play according to a given practical scenario (e.g., customer response, project meeting), and achieve a 'B' (80+ points) rating in 4 out of 5 evaluation rubric items (communication clarity, task terminology appropriateness, collaboration attitude, pronunciation accuracy, vocabulary diversity).

Learners analyze VR simulation log data (minimum 3 sessions) to create a visualized report (graphs/tables) on their professional language usage patterns (10+ vocabulary choices, 5 sentence structures, average response speed) and submit an improvement plan incorporating instructor feedback.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
